meanings.definition: The act of expressing good wishes or approval.
meanings.sent1: After the party, there was much greeing among the guests.
meanings.sent2: I heard a lot of greeing at the wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The greeing between the friends was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The greeing in the room filled the air with positivity.
meanings.sent5: The greeing from the audience made the performer smile.

meanings.definition: To express good wishes or approval.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys greeing everyone she meets.
meanings.sent2: He was greeing the team for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be greeing the sunny weather.
meanings.sent4: The flowers greeing the garden with their vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The teacher greeing the students before the exam boosted their confidence.

meanings.definition: To agree or be in harmony.
meanings.sent1: The siblings were greeing on which movie to watch.
meanings.sent2: The music and lyrics were greeing perfectly in the song.
meanings.sent3: The colors of the painting were greeing with each other.
meanings.sent4: The ingredients in the recipe were greeing well together.
meanings.sent5: The team members were greeing on the best strategy for the game.
